overview: Pro Wrestling Fujiwara Gumi was a shoot style professional wrestling promotion based in Tokyo, Japan. This event was held on August 23rd, 1991 at Nakajima Sports Center in Hokkaido Japan and presented the following matches: Kazuo Takahashi vs. Duane Koslowski, Jerry Flynn vs. Bart Vale, Yoshiaki Fujiwara vs. Lato Kiraware, Minoru Suzuki vs. Lawi Napataya & Wayne (Ken) Shamrock vs. Masakatsu Funaki.
title: PWFG: Hataage Dai-yonsen
